name: Star Wars: The Death Star
overview: You are on Level 2 deep inside The Death Star. You will encounter imperial troops, monsters, space pirates and gain or lose credits as you play. The Death Star is a large floating asteroid of human torture, death and destruction, run by Darth Vader of the Empire. Once thrown into the deep recesses of the death star there is little chance of escape. There are many dangers in the chambers and caverns of the death star but there are still a few rays of hope. May the Force be with you.
